pkgmetadata.longdescription: DChIPRep - Analysis of chromatin modification ChIP-Seq data with replication // The DChIPRep package implements a methodology to assess differences between chromatin modification profiles in replicated ChIP-Seq studies as described in Chabbert et. al - http://www.dx.doi.org/10.15252/msb.20145776. A detailed description of the method is given in the software paper at https://doi.org/10.7717/peerj.1981
